name: Hiden Ruin
description:
Enter into these hidden ruins and overcome the obstacles to find out what's inside.
Game features :
- Hiden Ruin is a litle side scrolling 2d platform game.
- Jump, dodge, dash across platforms to be able to beat the levels.
- Beat all the levels to enable the God mode of the game.
- 10 difficult levels to beat.
- Rare soundtrack.
- Pixel art graphics.
